summary: App is evolving into a sell/rent marketplace-style project where users can upload listings (via a '+' flow) and customers can contact listing owners; next build target is an in-app chat contact option (message polling) with possible future dashboard/admin and UI animations.
architectural_notes: Implement chat as non-real-time message polling (Internet Computer compatible).

existing_features.title: Add a messages UI in the frontend: an inbox of conversations and a conversation thread screen that polls for new messages and allows sending messages.
Wire the existing per-item “Contact” action to open the in-app chat with the correct listing owner, creating the conversation if needed.
Update the existing static Contact page to clarify it is for support/feedback, and add a clear entry point to the new in-app messages inbox for contacting sellers/owners.
Apply a cohesive visual theme across the new chat screens so they match the marketplace UI, using a distinct style that is consistent throughout the messages experience.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add chat-based 'Contact' option so customers can message the product/listing owner inside the app
Add contact/phone number field in the sell/rent item upload flow so customers can contact the user easily
Add animations / visual theme improvements (user interested in #7)
Implement backend support for an in-app chat that lets a customer start (or reopen) a conversation with a listing owner and exchange messages using non-real-time polling.

projectName: Add in-app contact chat between customers and listing owners (polling-based)
